title: my pixel 4a phone is flashing lights and cant to anything on it
content: I grabbed my phone out of my purse after just using it to check the time and the phone is flashing multicolored lights and won't let me access anything or even turn it off. cant use google voice mode either. Phone just has flashing colored lights on the screen all the time. I bought this phone in august this year when it cam out from best buy. They told me i have to contact you guys for the complementary year warranty.
